definition: to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams

pinyin: Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 ti3 yu4 chang3
Fa3 lan2 xi1 Ti3 yu4 chang3
Bei3 jing1 Guo2 jia1 Ti3 yu4 chang3
Bei3 jing1 Gong1 ren2 Ti3 yu4 chang3

sentences.english: A crowd of more than 84, 000 people attended the World Cup final at Soccer City Stadium.
sentences.chinese: 000多人观看了在足球城体育场举行的世界杯决赛。

sentences.english: S7:I'm going to be a cleaner to clean the gyms and take out the trash.
sentences.chinese: 我准备当上一名清洁工，清运垃圾，清扫体育场。

sentences.english: On his arrival, the pontiff circled the park packed stadium in his popemobile.
sentences.chinese: 教皇到达后，乘坐其座驾环绕满是人群的体育场。

sentences.english: Is engaged in the production development sports location product specially the enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 是专门从事生产开发体育场地产品的企业。

sentences.english: We hope that we can come out of the Stadio Franchi with our heads held high.
sentences.chinese: 我们期望我们可以高昂着头走出法兰齐体育场。

sentences.english: We can try to buy some tickets outside the stadium from a scalper.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以试着在体育场外买黄牛票。

sentences.english: The Lion King is at Daliang Stadium.
It also has the first class stadium and some gymnasiums .
sentences.chinese: 拥有国家一类体育场馆和数家体育健身场所。

sentences.english: The spectators trooped out of the stadium.
sentences.chinese: 观众成群结队地走出体育场。

sentences.english: One of them was perched up in a tree on the hill overlooking the stadium.
sentences.chinese: 其中一人还爬到了山丘的一棵树上，俯瞰体育场。

sentences.english: Sorry to disturb you, but can you show me the way to the stadium?
sentences.chinese: 请原谅，打扰了。请告诉我去体育场的路怎么走？

sentences.english: The front features the National Stadium, or Bird's Nest, on the middle-right.
sentences.chinese: 前线的特点，国家体育场，或燕窝，对中层的权利。

sentences.english: Developed the grandstands model of National Stadium for Beijing 2008 Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 图为用空间建模软件建的奥运会国家体育场看台模型。

sentences.english: They also must clear the stadium of asbestos — a potentially deadly killer if left uncontained.
sentences.chinese: 他们还得清除体育场的石棉，一旦任意弃置可能致命。

sentences.english: The electronic scoreboard is essential for stadiums and gymnasiums.
sentences.chinese: 电子计分牌是体育场馆中不可缺少的重要设备。

sentences.english: Liu was inconsolable after he walked into the stadium tunnel.
sentences.chinese: 在走进体育场通道时，刘翔极为伤心。

definition: abbr. for 男子足球 men's soccer/abbr. for 男子足球隊|男子足球队 men's soccer team
